post.author: 최덕선
post.content:
If you are interested, please contact Steffen.
..... Thank you very much for taking the time to speak with me. Can you send me a copy of your resume as well as a 3-5 line of your J2EE experience in the body of the email. Once I have it I will send it to the client right away
Thank you and I will keep you posted
Steffen
Steffen Allen Technical Resource Specialist The TAL Group 416 599 1825 ext.227 1 877 503 2464 ext.227 Fax 416 599 8251 sa@talgroup.net
post.title: 6 month contract at Siemens (J2EE developer/architect role)
